OOC Sorry I didn't get online over the weekend, I had a few things I had to
do. I met a couple of people at a few Garage sales who wanted to sell thier
collections of Transformers. they were mostly in good shape so I bought them
out. I got about four hundred toys. Transformers, Gobots, Robotech, and some
generic ones for $225. I already have the Micro master rocket base sold for
$50 so I should have no problems making a profit.

BIC Blacknightmares stun missed Silver Scout striking the wall behind her.
She was ready to strike a killing blow to Kit Kat when the bot countered
quickly grabbing the mutant. Plasma blasts struck Silver Scout solidly
causing a searing pain to shoot through her body. The mutants plasma based
energeon system prevented any serious damage as drops of her red energeon
hit the floor. The blasts changed her momentum preventing Kit Kat from
slamming her down so the mutant did the next best thing. She rolled to the
ground attempting to flip Kit Kat between her and the other bots.

A sudden burning sensation and the sight of her shadow told her that her
cloak was down. until her internal systems repaired it she was an open
target. Her actions made it to late for an apology or a surender. In the
condition she was in her only defenses were her teeth and claws. They
weren't much in a firefight but in these close quarters she'd make due.

Blaze drew her disruptor when Silver Scout appeared. She aimed carefully and
waited for either an open shot or orders to fire with Kit Kat at risk.
Bullet knew his rocket launcher wasn't any good in thier own base so he grew
a force pistol from his side. He wanted to fire but didn't want to risk
harming the other Predacon. He hoped the orders were to take the chance and
fire. He didn't care as long as he got to shoot something.
